item.description:
The CGC Drop-In Class will focus on... you guessed it!... steps to the AKC's Canine Good Citizen test!

If you are unfamiliar with "Canine Good Citizen-ship" please check out this page at http://www.hexdogs.com/canine-good-citizen-training--testing.html.

The CGC is a ten-step test that, in a nutshell, demonstrates that your dog is well-behaved, under owner control & safe. Passing the CGC test is like having a "Certified Good Dog."

We will focus on two or three individual steps every week (sit for greeting, stay at 20 feet, come when called, etc.), providing a great & effective learning environment for all dogs & owners in pursuit of their CGC, whether they're new & inexperienced, or simply practicing & "brushing up" on that one step they haven't conquered!

As a certified Canine Good Citizen Evaluator, I am not only able to help train you & your dog for the CGC certification, I am able to test you, as well. Please keep an eye on our facebook page for possible last minute info or schedule changes. http://www.facebook.com/hexdogs.

All breeds & ages welcome! First-come/first-serve. Participating dogs must be reasonably tolerant of other dogs - if not, there is actually a Reactive Dog Handling Class for you! CGC Drop-In is $16 per dog, per Drop-In. You are welcome to pre-register/pre-pay to reserve your spot, but it is not a requirement for Drop-In Classes. You may do that here: http://www.hexdogs.com/register-for-classes.html.

Don't hesitate to contact me with any questions or concerns!  justcassie101@gmail.com
item.name: CGC Prep. & Testing Drop-In Class is BACK!
